name: Cat Breakout
description:
I made this Breakout clone in 2 days for no particular reason. The game includes cats so it must be great.

Controls:

  • Move with left and right arrows
  • Reset with R 

The Game features:

  • Juicy Gameplay
  • 5 color schemes 
  • Music by Dasnukki

The Game does not feature:

  • Game over or win screen (who actually needs them)
  • Points or scoring
  • Voice acting by Chris Pratt

 The game is very heavily inspired by this talk by Petri Purho and Martin Johansson:
